title: Topic 002 Question 050
body: Your network contains an on-premises Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) domain that syncs with an Azure AD tenant. The AD DS domain contains the organizational units (OUs) shown in the following table.
You need to create a break-glass account named BreakGlass.
Where should you create BreakGlass, and which role should you assign to BreakGlass? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
